parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce. From ek and ballo; to eject.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
